comments.author: Kamil
comments.content:
HAHA, I can't believe that no one turned off your alarm for 7 months!!! If it was my house, I will get scolded the next day I arrived in Japan!

Anyway, really really nice pics. I never took any pictures on the plane, maybe I will do when I go back to Hong Kong!!! Have great fun in Holland. See you after your trip to Hokkaido!! And please take more cool pictures!!!

じゃあね！
